subject: Web3
title: Governance Tokens Explained
description: A short lesson to help you apply Governance Tokens Explained.

hook.text: In a DAO, your voting power comes from governance tokens. More tokens, more votes. It's democracy weighted by stake.

buildup.text: Tokens can be earned by contributing, bought on exchanges, or received through airdrops to early users.

discovery.text: Proposals need a minimum number of tokens to submit. Passing requires a quorum â€” a minimum participation threshold.

twist.text: Most token holders never vote. Participation rates in major DAOs average below 10%.

climax.text: Governance tokens gave everyone a voice. The problem is that almost nobody uses it.

punchline.text: Everyone got voting rights. Hardly anyone shows up to vote.

quiz.question: What is a common problem with DAO governance participation?
options: Most token holders never vote, with participation below 10%
